# Build your Proximity Verifier

## Overview

The EUDI Proximity Verifier App is part of the EUDI Reference Implementation for proximity-based credential verification according to ISO 18013-5.
 
Built with Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP/CMP), it currently supports Android, with iOS implementation planned as outlined in the [EUDI Wallet Reference Implementation Roadmap](https://github.com/orgs/eu-digital-identity-wallet/projects/24){:target="_blank"}.
